https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nvU6WhOCV1GzebkpVatzuIoMMSR.jpg Alex, the son of a gang boss from Marseilles, joins the French Foreign Legion to avoid a hit put out on him by the Corsican Mafia. Four years later, Alex deserts and returns to Marseilles to get back together with Katia, his former girlfriend. But in the city, relationships have changed... De guerre lasse
